name: Dungeon Skirmish
description:
This is a solo dev project I put together in Unreal Engine in two weeks. It is based on a team project we developed in pygame during Sophomore year.

Play against your friends in randomly generated dungeons, powering up your character until the clock hits 0, then fight it out in a free for all arena against one another!

Please let me know if you like it and how it runs on your PC. If you have suggestions or bug reports I may be able to implement them in an updated release. I hope to develop more games in the future so your input means alot!
